tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: createTrack
api_list.description: Returns ID of newly created package (status=CREATED) or stored ID if this tracking number already exists (status=FOUND).

utterances.utterance: Please create a tracking entry for the package with tracking number 1Z999AA10123456784.
Add tracking for the parcel with tracking code 9400110200881234567890 and specify the carrier as USPS.
Create a new tracking record for the shipment with tracking number LX123456789CN destined for China.
Track the package with tracking code 1234567890US and carrier FedEx.
Register the tracking number RR123456789GB for a parcel going to the United Kingdom.
Please create tracking for the shipment with code 420221234567890123456789012345 and carrier DHL.
Add a tracking entry for the package with tracking number 8Z12345E0291980793 destined for Canada.
Create tracking for the parcel with tracking code 3S123456789012345 and carrier UPS.
Please add tracking for the shipment with tracking number 1234567890JP going to Japan.
Create a tracking record for the package with tracking code 9405510200881234567890 without specifying carrier or destination.

api_list.name: refreshTrack
api_list.description: Submits on-demand refresh request to tracking engine for package with given ID. Please note, that packages in ACTIVE list are auto-tracked regularly so you don't need to do this for such packages.

api_list.name: moveTrack
api_list.description: Moves package with given ID to ARCHIVED, TRASHED or back to ACTIVE list.
